oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Civil War pension
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: United States Bureau of Pensions form No. 529,859 issued to William Waldrup, Pvt., Co. F, 6th Tennessee Cavalry Regt., USA. The form states that William will receive $12 per month, payable quarterly beginning in February 1913. Waldrup was a farmer and native of Hardin Co. He enlisted in 1862 and was discharged at Pulaski, Tenn., in 1865.
